sourcesContent:
import mongoose from 'mongoose'

mongoose.Promise = Promise
mongoose.connect(
  'mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/',
  {
    dbName: 'e-commerce',
    promiseLibrary: Promise,
    useNewUrlParser: true,
    useUnifiedTopology: true,
    useCreateIndex: true,
    useFindAndModify: false,
  },
)

import mongoose from 'mongoose'

mongoose.Promise = Promise
mongoose.connect(
  'mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/',
  {
    dbName: 'e-commerce',
    promiseLibrary: Promise,
    useNewUrlParser: true,
    useUnifiedTopology: true,
    useCreateIndex: true,
    useFindAndModify: false,
  },
)

import { schemaComposer } from 'graphql-compose'

import './relations'
import * as queryFields from './queries'
import * as mutationFields from './mutations'

schemaComposer.Query.addFields(queryFields)
schemaComposer.Mutation.addFields(mutationFields)

const GQLSchema = schemaComposer.buildSchema()

export default GQLSchema
import './user'
export * from './user'
import { UserTC } from '../../models'
export * from './user'
export * from './user'
export * from './user'

import mongoose from 'mongoose'

mongoose.Promise = Promise
mongoose.connect(
  'mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/',
  {
    dbName: 'e-commerce',
    promiseLibrary: Promise,
    useNewUrlParser: true,
    useUnifiedTopology: true,
    useCreateIndex: true,
    useFindAndModify: false,
  },
)

import { schemaComposer } from 'graphql-compose'

import './relations'
import * as queryFields from './queries'
import * as mutationFields from './mutations'

schemaComposer.Query.addFields(queryFields)
schemaComposer.Mutation.addFields(mutationFields)

const GQLSchema = schemaComposer.buildSchema()

export default GQLSchema
import { UserTC } from "../../models";

export * from './user'
export * from './product'
export * from './promotion'

import mongoose from 'mongoose'

mongoose.Promise = Promise
mongoose.connect(
  'mongodb://127.0.0.1:27017/',
  {
    dbName: 'e-commerce',
    promiseLibrary: Promise,
    useNewUrlParser: true,
    useUnifiedTopology: true,
    useCreateIndex: true,
    useFindAndModify: false,
  },
)
import { UserTC } from '../../models'

export * from './user'
export * from './product'

import { ProductTC } from "../../models";

export const products = ProductTC.getResolver("findMany");
import { ProductTC } from "../../models";
import { PromotionTC } from "../../models";

import { PromotionTC } from "../../models";

export const promotions = PromotionTC.getResolver("findMany");
